name: Dread Knight Champion
description: The Dread Knight Champion is a formidable undead with high strength and charisma, wielding a cursed greatsword that drains life.
memorable: Its ability to turn defeated foes into zombies and its powerful necrotic attacks make it a terrifying opponent.
goals: To conquer and recruit fallen enemies as undead minions.
relations: Often serves dark lords or necromancers, commanding armies of undead.
environment: Dark and foreboding locations, often where undead rise.
strengths: Immunities to various damage types and conditions, exceptional saving throw modifiers, and powerful area control abilities.
weaknesses: Limited to specific damage weaknesses such as fire against ice walls.
attacks: Uses a cursed greatsword to inflict slashing and necrotic damage, also capable of area fire damage and necrotic attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Can deal substantial necrotic damage while reducing hit point maximums and summoning undead.
equipment: Cursed greatsword named Legion, enhancing attacks and transferring life from victims.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet, allowing it to see through magical darkness.
skills: Excels in intimidation and has keen perception, making it difficult to surprise.
additional_information: Undead nature allows it to operate without air, food, or sleep.
Has an aura that provides advantages on saving throws for allies.
Can summon a fiendish steed to aid in combat.
Ability to break magic effects enhances its versatility.
Creates ice walls for battlefield control and damage.
test_queries: formidable foe with ice walls and fire blasts
